Uses of Class
eu.ehri.project.exceptions.SerializationError

  • Packages that use SerializationError 
    Package Description
    eu.ehri.extension
    Jersey resource classes for providing web service access to the graph, via the eu.ehri.project.views layer.
    eu.ehri.extension.base  
    eu.ehri.project.persistence
    Classes dealing with persistence of relational item data in sub-tree format.
    eu.ehri.project.views
    Classes that provide data access "views" on the graph that incorporate the permission and access-control systems.
    eu.ehri.project.views.impl
